markdownRemark.html:
Let’s explore the world. “Go” to a random location and do some Plein Air Painting from the comfort of your home

Optional challenges

  • Time limit: 5 minutes
  • Reinterpret the picture based on a mood or genre (e.g. make it scary)

Resources

  • MapCrunch
  • GeoGuessr
